title: Pediatric Micropenis - Conditions and Treatments | Children's National Hospital
description: A micropenis is a penis that is smaller than normal. Learn more about this condition.
cleaned_text: about the Division of Endocrinology and Diabetes which is a nationally recognized leader in treating a variety of endocrine disorders. At Children's National Hospital in Washington, D.C., our pediatric urologists provide comprehensive care for disorders affecting reproductive and urinary organs.
